name: G.I.Tech
description:
Spectrum-BASIC.Ayuda a Duke a infiltrarse en el castillo COBRA para desactivar una poderosa bomba de protones-X. Tu enemigo, el COMANDANTE COBRA estará permanentemente acechándote.

--------------

Spectrum-BASIC. Help Duke to infiltrate the COBRA castle in order to deactivate a powerful proton-X bomb. Your enemy, the COBRA COMMANDER, will be continuously trying to kill you.
